about_the_game:
"Girls on Campus, from Freshmen to Faculty, All Fall for Me!" is an immersive video game of love simulation. What's different is that the characteristics of the current cool drama are integrated into the game. The real-life kneeling and licking spare tires do not exist. Just give me brainless girls chasing boys! Various super sweet close-ups, have a hearty love (or several) with beautiful girls!

Lin Yan, a senior, is carefree, simple-minded and strong-willed.


Lin Ran, a junior, Lin Yan's sister, has a cute and lovely image in front of people. She has a bad relationship with her strong sister since she was a child, so she gradually learned to hide her true feelings.


Shen Meng, cold on the outside, weak on the inside, easily manipulated by the strong opposite sex.


Chen Xi, not long after the biological mother of Lin Yan and Lin Ran died, was married to their father and became their stepmother.


Su Qing, a mysterious junior, a girl who wants to avenge her sister.


Product Features

First-person perspective experience——
The first-person perspective setting provides a strong sense of immersion, giving players an immersive and sweet love experience.

Multiple lines with open endings——
Each heroine has her own story line, and a fully developed ending is waiting for you to explore

Beautiful figure, hearty——
Five beautiful heroines, doing their best to perform their roles to bring you one or more love fantasies!

content_descriptors.notes: Some of the video content and lines in the game may contain: "partial nudity", "sexual suggestion", "alcoholism" and other content, which may not be suitable for all ages

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/Windows 11
  • Processor: intel core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

publishers: Girls on Campus, from Freshmen to Faculty, All Fall for Me!
short_description: In this exciting love interaction game, players act as a photography-loving sophomore who, after being knocked out during a shoot, finds themselves entangled in various indescribable scenarios with female seniors, juniors, and a married teacher!
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Indonesian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
